description:
Like all other Microsoft Office software, the email application Outlook is one of those programs that many people use a lot but never really master it. Once your outlook is configured and you start sending and receiving emails it is normal to forget thinking about other advanced features which can help you a lot in increasing your productivity tremendously.

There are many rare tips and tricks covered in this course that take a minimal amount of time to learn and set up.

The configurations and information covered in this course will not only save you time, but will also keep your inbox, outbox, and daily work life cleaner and more organized.
title: Learn Microsoft Outlook Step by Step from Scratch
